name: The Cursed One
description: Miguel is a young man who is losing grip on the world around him, feeling as though everything he does is meaningless. Unbeknownst to Miguel, he was inflicted with a curse at a very young age and this is the source for his downward spiral. When a fateful encounter with a witch changes his course of actions, Miguel must decide on the ending best fit to ensure he has the perfect future.In order to solidify the relationships, he must make love to them...a lot. All it takes is a bit of bending of the rules for the one known as The Cursed One.
